jodd.typeconverter

Class Convert

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.typeconverter.Convert

  • public class Convert
extends java.lang.Object
    Static version of ConvertBean of default TypeConverterManagerBean.

    • Method Detail

      • getConvertBean

        protected static ConvertBean getConvertBean()
        Returns default ConvertBean. We should not store this instance in a static variable as default TypeConverterManagerBean may be changed.
